message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value for us at $15000, reflecting its quality and craftsmanship. I understand its worth to you might be even higher at $15000. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12000. This represents a significant saving for you while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and we can proceed with the transaction.
